name: Ball Fighter
overview: A SEUCK based shooter for 1 or 2 players, including simultaneous cooperative play. Released in Digital Marketing PD #092, released as Super Ball by Editions Fermont in Italy in Go Games n.43 (maggio 1989). With this beautiful arcade style game you can display your ability to control the Super Ball which you use to destroy the various asteroids and the many enemies that you will find along your path.
